reviews.title: Rich %26 versatile
reviews.review_text: This NYX Jumbo all-in-one Blueberry eye "pencil" is richly colored, goes on smoothly, and blends very well. With eyelid primer, powder, a lighter-colored powdered eyeshadow, this thickly lined my lid at the lash line, and I was able to smudge it up and over to the corner of my eyelid perfectly. I wore it to a Yankee game, it was 80¬∞ and humid, and it did not budge. It's pretty terrific stuff. Hope you enjoy it as much as I did!
Color is rich and does not washout with color added for effect. Love this product!!!! Thank you so much for having this beautiful color and available. I will always purchase from you.

reviews.title: Stays on all day!!
reviews.review_text: I was happy to find a dark brown eyeliner. I believe it was the color.Frappe. You have to use a light hand if you don't want it to be too bold but it is very long lasting. I was confused as to how to get more out. I figured you would turn it up from the bottom but had to YouTube it and you have to use a wide pencil sharpener to get more product. And it makes the point sharper of course. Great product!

reviews.title: Great eye pencils
reviews.review_text: Love these eye pencils, the colors make my green eyes pop. The glitter is fun, and layering the colors too

reviews.title: Sheer and glides on easily
reviews.review_text: I really like how this glides on. The color is sheer, so it's not as pigmented as the color on the pencil. It gives you a great smudged look. You can put it on quickly without being careful about it. That being said, it doesn't last for very long. üòí I bought a dark brown. Sorry, I should have looked at it before I started writing this, so I'm not sure of the exact name.

Love the colors, love the price, lasts all day but does crease up .. however.. you dont get much out of it because, although it says it's sharpenable, it's NOT. The outer stick is PLASTIC, so there's no way to sharpen. what you see in the tip is all you'll get out of it.

reviews.title: Sad that this doesnt work for me.
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product but unfortunately unless i use it as an all over shadow it doesnt work with my slightly hooded eyes as an eyeliner, it just ends up in the crease and looking crazy.

reviews.title: Only a Tip of a Pencil
reviews.review_text: Great pencil; love color and idea of it, but is very small and you only get what you see at point. It looks like a regular pencil that can be turned up as you use but does not. You're paying for a pencil tip even though the container is 5 iinches long. Very disappointing.!

reviews.title: Why a sharpener? Why not a twist-up?
reviews.review_text: The product itself is smooth and creamy, I apply it all over and smooth with a brush for theatrical makeup. However I was so confused when I first bought it I actually had to look up online how to get at the stuff once I had used the first tip. I was dismayed to find it actually required a giant pencil sharpener - had to get a carpentry pencil sharpener out of the garage - and sharpening breaks it, leaves sharp bits that scratch your skin, and pulls the whole stick out of the applicator... Very disappointed with the packaging for such a lovely product, but I guess that's why it's cheap.

reviews.title: Very Poor ‚ÄúWearability‚Äù - unable to use . . .
reviews.review_text: This product is a Great color, applied smoothly as an eyeliner. PROBLEM: Smeared Immediately and moved into my eyes irritating them. Useless . . . does not stay in place. I first tested a line on the top of my hand . . . There was Zero product staying on my hand when I lightly wiped over the product line. I tried it then as a eyeliner - it started spreading and thinning immediately. This product rates Very Poor for ‚Äúwearability‚Äù ‚Ä¶ very disappointed and unable to use this product. . . It smears and does not stay in place!

reviews.title: Love the product but the packaging is ridiculous
reviews.review_text: I love the color options and the texture is very nice and creamy, I love to just spread all over my lids and call it a day! I def recommend using a primer because it does tend to crease. My gripe with this product which is also the reason why I even pulled up to this page to see if other people had the same problem is that it isn't a twist up! And you can't sharpen it because it comes in a plastic casing so once I used up the tip I didn't know what to do. And I was very frustrated because I was guessing there is product all the way down the inside of the tube I just didn't know how to get to it. So I deadass just cut through the plastic to get to the rest of the color which is ridiculous but it worked.

reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
reviews.review_text: I saw this in black and decided to give it a try. I needed black eyeliner/shadow/whatever for around my eyes and on my face for my plague doctor outfit for Halloween. I usually just use cheap eye shadow, but it doesn't last long and rubs off too easily. This pencil is fantastic. It went on smoothly and easily (I didn't even need to blend it) and it washed off slightly less easy (I used makeup remover to get it all off). But it is fantastic and it did exactly what I hoped it would do.

reviews.title: Best Base
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Jumbo Eye Pencil in Milk for literally the last 6 years as an eyeshadow base, it's pretty much my holy grail when 30$ bases crease or get too oily. I have the sharpener but honestly I prefer using a small cosmetic spatula to scoop some product onto my eyelid then blend out with fingers before eyeshadow application, and believe me there is SO MUCH product in these things, I use it daily and only have to buy 1 to last me a solid year. It's always in my recommended products when people come to me for makeup advice and I usually have 1 or 2 extra on hand to just give away to people LOL. One of my top 5 makeup products hands down.

reviews.title: Nice product but have to sharpen it
reviews.review_text: I love smudgy eyeliners and they're hard to find; but I wish these had a twist mechanism instead of having to be sharpened! I don't want a point and it feels wasteful; I want my blunt edge and it the product doesn't extend far enough above the casing to maintain a blunt edge for long.

reviews.title: Bleeds like a broken heart
reviews.review_text: Pros first. Was easy to apply and to blend. Good for a quick smokey eye look without much elbow grease. Now the sad part. Oh it bleeds and how. This product is not meant to be applied to the lower waterline. Period. Might be good for a quick daytime eye makeup. Be sure to prime and set the eyes before and after.

reviews.title: 619 Rust
reviews.review_text: decent color payoff on waterline, although 619 Rust color appears a bit pinkish until you really layer it on (if you're not into the whole pink-eye look). Please include instructions on package for how to sharpen! Tried to pull it open and twist and all the things until found a video online explaining (you just sharpen as if it's a regular wood pencil with a pencil sharpener)

reviews.title: You can't sharpen this üëé
reviews.review_text: The makeup itself is good but it's impossible to sharpen it even with a big sharper. You can either, only use the visible tip seen or find a knife a try to cut away the plastic edge to get more product that's otherwise useless. Wasteful and bad designed product.

reviews.title: Transform your eyes with this product!
reviews.review_text: This product is worth the price! It applies easily and smoothly and the color is bold and vibrant! It really makes eyes look bright and alive! I am impressed with the quality and functionality of this product! I recommend trying it and see for yourself the transformation this product offers. You won't regret it!
Doesn't go on the eyelid smoothly. Doesn't show color well. Rolls up in the eyelid creases quickly. Very disappointing.

reviews.title: For the price, it's a good value.
reviews.review_text: The pencils go on very easily, however; they are a lot lighter in color than they looked when I bought them online.

reviews.title: Need more
reviews.review_text: i love this stick, just wish it pushed up to get more for your money

reviews.title: Less deep wrinklesref for colored hair
reviews.review_text: This helps to lighten my wrinkles as they look less deep when you use a highlighter. It's smooth and lighter than my makeup. It looks much better
Good color and easy to use. You will need to find a sharpener because it doesn't roll up automatically and has an odd size so the standard sharpeners in my house didn't work.

reviews.title: Awesome eye pencils!
reviews.review_text: I've been buying these eye pencils for a few years, in different shades. I love the coverage and pop of color they provide. Better than similar eye pencils on the market. Great price for a great product.

reviews.title: Overall not good.
reviews.review_text: Feels sticky on the eye and gathers in the crease. Says that you can apply powder on top but thats why I got this because powder makes such a mess and ends up on my lashes and face. Don't like that you can't screw it out, you have to sharpen the plastic and it never works well as it is soft. I have read that you can freeze it first but you shouldn't have to do that. This would be a great product if it was cream to powder and the pencil wasn't quite so thick.

reviews.title: What am I missing here?
reviews.review_text: Some people say you can use a regular large size eyeliner sharpener to sharpen this? How does that work when the outside is hard plastic. I think this product need to go back to the store.

reviews.title: Sharpening Trick
reviews.review_text: If u have trouble sharpening this pencil as I did, if your largest size sharpener has an insert like mine does just pop the insert out and then you will get a beauty sharpen for the jumbo eye pencil!

reviews.title: Pretty Colors, but......
reviews.review_text: I thought these were the answer to all of my eyeshadow needs and I bought several of these in different colors. I used to have a Laura Mercier pencil like these and I loved it. Sadly, for me, these just start dripping off of my eyelid. I guess I have oily eyelids and it is a common problem, so for me, even though they are beautiful colors, I will have to return them. If you do not have that problem, I think you will love them.

reviews.title: Sharpen the dang thing jeez
reviews.review_text: I wish they made it more clear on here, or on packaging. It is not a ‚Äútwist‚Äù even though the bottom is plastic, there's a ton of more makeup - INSIDE. I got a really cheap jumbo makeup pencil sharpener online that came in 2 days for it. It does have a tiny cap on the sharpener you'll need to take off to fit (I know sounds like a butt, but SO easy) I was confused for a bit, I was like surely it has more in it than this until I saw a review saying what to do lol on the actual makeup part though- this is my favorite. I've probably tried I dunno 100? Maybe highlights from doing cosmetology, and loving makeup for forever. This one works for me personally (different for everyone obviously) I have oily skin, but can get a dry nose in winter/ if I do a peel mask. This is the only one that doesn't look like my makeup is separating or coming off. I put some on the tops of checks, under my eyebrow, and nose. Usually where I can see light is hitting naturally. It is very moveable. If you are planning on putting it on your eyelids too- I would steer clear of that idea, for this product if your eyelids are oily like mine. It will crease. Also I put a little in my lower inner eye to make me look more awake lol. ANYWAY highly recommend, just takes a sec to sharpen it once in awhile. BTW it will sound like plastic%26 you might be confused when you sharpen it, but it is pushing up product! :) good luck with your makeup :) Also last thought- I don't put much product out in case it does break off somehow so I don't lose any of the product.
i never received this. not sure why walmart is asking for a review
Never received this from Walmart and didn't get a refund

reviews.title: Jumbo Eye Pencil
reviews.review_text: I bought three colors of these liners, blue, gold and white. The white is the most effective and the one I use the most for both my inner eye and to highlight underneath my brows. The gold and blue are for more occasional wear. They do bleed and smudge throughout the day pretty easily so the blue is a little more tricky to wear. It is also similar in size to a crayon so the tip is thicker.

reviews.title: Defective
reviews.review_text: Mine was defective. Would not advance any more product, so all I could use was what was showing when it was purchased. Finally opened the case and you could see more product in there, but no infrastructure to deliver more product to the outside. Product was creamy and long lasting - too bad I could only use a little bit of it.

reviews.title: Great texture, not crease proof
reviews.review_text: I bought this in Rust to use as an eyeliner and am very impressed with the creamy texture and the way it applies. There's no dragging, it's really blendable, and opaque. However, it won't ever "settle down" so it will smudge no matter how long you let it sit and it'll transfer if you have oily lids. I have slightly oily lids, so the creasing doesn't bother me. I actually think the mild creasing is great for a wearable editorial look. SHARPENING TIP I followed a youtube video where the girl put the pencil in the freezer for 15 minutes before sharpening. It makes sharpening a creamy pencil much easier. The "plastic" bit is actually more of a shiny/waxy coating to make it look more appealing. The pencil itself is made of paper.
I had no issues getting this and your pricing was a bit lower when compared to other stores when I was searching for it.

reviews.title: Eye pencil

reviews.title: Love the thickness

reviews.title: NYX eye crayon

reviews.title: Nice color but
reviews.review_text: Nice color, goes on smoothly, but there doesn't seem to be any way to bring the product up from the tube as you use it. The end twists but the tip doesn't get any longer. So I guess when this little visible half-inch runs out, this crayon is done.

reviews.title: Not for melanated people
reviews.review_text: Not brown skin friendly- disappointed would not recommend will never purchase from NYX again- it's 2024- how much more time do y'all need to get this right? Poor quality no stay, low lift, not buildable- Boooooooooo!

reviews.title: Black bean and milk
reviews.review_text: These jumbo pencils are great and super affordable, milk makes a great base for bright shadows, and I like to use the black shade for smokey eye looks. Must haves in your make up bag.

reviews.title: Disappointed eyeliner fanatic
reviews.review_text: Not a true dark brown. Goes on super light like a shadow and then sticks to your upper lid. Doesn't stay on well. Super disappointed. Really wanted a far brown stick to replace my discontinued one.

reviews.title: I love Jumbo Eye Pencils but....
reviews.review_text: I love the Jumbo Eye Pencils, but sometimes they wear down and can't be sharpened back to a semi-point (my #631 Sparkle Leopard is unusable but I refuse to throw it out). I've tried the YouTube video that suggests freezing them for 15 minutes and then sharpening them; sometimes it works and sometimes it doesn't. Any suggestions? Thank you.

reviews.title: Another shadow base option
reviews.review_text: Nice, a bit sticky when applied, best when sheered out. Yes, you can sharpen it with any large sharpener. When it's sheered ot and used as a base, there's no creasing. If you use it as a stand-alone shadow, it fades patchy and creases a lot. Use it as a shadow base. :)

reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
reviews.review_text: Loce this purple color. It was easy to blend using my finger. I also used it as a base for some similarly colored purple eye shadow and it made tge color payoff awesome! I worried this would be oily or leave creases but it didn't. It stays exactly where you put it.

reviews.title: Jumbo eyeshadow

Great colors, eggplant on the bottom and cupcake on the top opens up your eyes. Still waiting for the sharpener to come in, but I did find a old sharpener that works for now. I'm not as young as I used to be but with the extremely fabulous new products I look and feel 10 years younger.

reviews.title: Amazing eyeliner!!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I bought this on my daughter's suggestion and love it! I have my eyes permanently done and they sometimes look very dark. I put this on the inner eye and it makes my eyes pop! It is my very favorite. Goes on smooth and lasts.long.

reviews.title: matcha is so cute
reviews.review_text: omg i love it! i got the matcha green one and it's really cute and sparkly. i have mono lids and oily skin and it stays pretty well, sometimes it mixes with my melted mascara but it's shocking since it's a crayon (i'm used to most products just smudging right off). i use it for a light eyeshadow and inner corner highlight. i do not use a base but sometimes i'll set with the nyx spray

reviews.title: Jumbo Eye Pencils are great!
reviews.review_text: I love my Jumbo Eye Pencils. They cover my eyelid very smoothly and softly, no pulling of the eyelid. There is a very good selection of colors (I would like a darker forest green added to the lighter greens available-please). I am delighted with these shadow pencils and recommend them highly.

reviews.title: JUST SHARPEN THEM!! ITS NOT THAT DIFFICULT.
reviews.review_text: People, get it together and sharpen the thing. It sharpens extremely easily (more so than a wood pencil or one of the black plastic ones like urban decay or Maybelline tattoo liner) and allows you to apply with more precision than a wide twist up. Everyone is so used to auto pencils nowadays that they can't appreciate the utility of something sharpenable. Get a good German steel sharpener and you'll never look back. Re: formula‚ÄîThey're great, just wish there were more colors (a deep red in matte and metallic would be beautiful.

reviews.title: Good smooth applying eye liner.
reviews.review_text: Some reason it's hard to find fat eyeliner pencils anymore and when you do they are over priced and not worth a hoot. This one is comparable to L.A. Colors big eye pencil. Cost a little more but I could not find the L.A.Color fat pencil so I got this one. It's soft and creamy so no tugging on delicate eye area. The color goes on super dark and rich so make sure your drawing where you want it or you'll have to redo your whole eye. It lasts all day with no touch up or raccoon eyes. It's a good eye pencil if that's what your looking for.

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.review_text: I use these as eyeshadow bases and on their own. Great staying power! They blend like a dream and are so versatile. For the idiots who claim they're faulty - they're not retractable. They must be sharpened with a standard large sharpener to create a point. They're staples in my collection!

reviews.title: Like the pencil, but not the amount in the pencil
reviews.review_text: I like the Jumbo eye pencil colors and how they look on my eyelids.,I am not happy with the fact it does not roll up when the color is low. It looks like there is more in the tube to roll up but it does not move. Seems like a rip off as a result paying almost nine dollars for a tip of color.

reviews.title: Terrible!!
reviews.review_text: I received this item and was excited to try it out. I was very disappointed! There is NO WAY to push the crayon out of the plastic tube, so you can only use about 1/4 inch of the entire stick. The plastic tube is full of the make-up, but you cannot get to it. Terrible design! I will NEVER buy this item again.

reviews.title: Love these eye pencils!
reviews.review_text: I have bought these eye pencils several times over the past few years and love them. I like the larger size and the colors that they come in. The price is very reasonable. I also buy the pencil sharpener which is a must to sharpen them. The only complaint I have about the sharpener is that it doesn't stay sharp for a very long time. I usually have to order a new one every 9-12 months.

reviews.title: THIS PENCIL WORKS!!
reviews.review_text: I couldn't live without this NYX MILK PENCIL. I learned years ago from watching a Beauty Show on TV that when you need to brighten up tired eyes [from my regular lack of sleep], using a white pencil to line lower eyes line would brighten your eyes. It does! However, some of these white pencils don't do a good job and barely leave any white on lower eyes -- NYX does. I use it daily.

reviews.review_text: I have been struggling for literally forever, my whole life, to find a pigmented white eyeliner! I saw that a TikTok beauty blogger used this and ran to order it! I was not disappointed! It is the only pencil I have ever found that also works on my water line. I'm sad I didn't know about this product before. Has become my favourite pencil and beauty product.

reviews.title: Super versatile and easy to use, perfect shimmer
reviews.review_text: This is such a versatile product. You can use it on your eyes, cheeks, lips, collar bone~ The formula is so smooth and feels great on the skin. The shimmer isn't overwhelming and you can build it up for a bolder look. I used it as an eyeshadow topper for a shimmery look on the lids, and on top of my lipstick so it catches the light. It's also great as a highlight, and super easy to blend.

reviews.title: So Impressed
reviews.review_text: I was bit reluctant in buying this but then picked it during this sale, So glad I did. It is the best make up product I've ever found. It is super long lasting, very pigmented, can be used as a perfect base for eyeshadows to make them even brighter and more pigmented. It is so creamy and glides effortlessly.It makes the colour pop and gives my eyes the depth effect. Cannot wait to try more colors.

reviews.title: I'm in love!
reviews.review_text: I'm in love! This product glides on the skin and doesn't scratch! it's super pigmented and gives the right glow effect! makes your skin look incredible and doesn't clump or oxidise! especially as its a multi use product I can see it benefiting a lot of people! A Highlighter, LIp Colour, Eyeshadow and the list goes on! I'm absolutely in love I now need it in ALL colours!

reviews.title: Should have checked reviews...
reviews.review_text: Yes. Sharpening is an issue. It looks like it twists up. I'm not interested in investing in yet ANOTHER company's sharpener. The hard plastic does not sharpen well, regardless. Shame on me for not being more careful. Won't purchase plastic pencils that need sharpening ever again!

reviews.title: just the tipüò≥
reviews.review_text: this is such a great eyeliner! but the whole not twisting up thing was so confusing? so i have just been using the tip and then getting another! so it has a separate purchase for a sharpener! that makes so much more sense than just the tip!!! like if the sharpener was included i would have so sharpened the plastic! but i just been using the tip and then getting another....üò≥

reviews.title: SUPER HIGHLIGHTING STICKS!!!
reviews.review_text: I love these highlighter sticks, they're easy to use and very blendable. You can also use them as eyeshadow in a pinch! I purchased them in Coconut Cake, Apple Pie and Blueberry Muffin. All are highly pigmented and long-lasting! I really enjoy using and wearing them! I'm very happy with my purchase!

reviews.title: great for inner corner
reviews.review_text: i love this product! i have been using milk for years in the inner corner and it really brightens the eye and helps dark circles. the pigmentation is great in the more vibrant shades as well. definitely a staple of mine. my only complaint would be that i find my self wanting to touch up throughout the day as it does not wear as long as i would like.

reviews.title: Plastic Version Cannot be Sharpened!
reviews.review_text: There appears to be two versions of this eye pencil ‚Äî one that can be sharpened and one that has a hard plastic casing. I assumed the bottom of the plastic casing would spin such that I could reveal more product (much like chapstick), but it doesn't ‚Äî it appears to be just for show. Could not test this until after the shrink wrap was removed. I feel very deceived and am highly disappointed!

I LOVE IT SMMM It is creamy, easy to apply, and has a really good pigment I got "milk" for highlighting, I used it for the inner corners of my eyes, nose, and a tiny bit under the brow and it works better then my powder highlighter! Definitely will buy again,

reviews.title: Can't get cap off
reviews.review_text: Honestly, I have not gotten to try it yet. The first one I bought, the lid was stuck to the pencil, and the pencil snapped in half when I used pliers to try to get it off. The second one I bought is currently having the same issue. I can't get the lid off, but I haven't snapped it in half yet.

reviews.title: Love these!
reviews.review_text: I used the Elf pencil sharpener that has a large and small sharpener and the pencil easily sharpens. There‚Äôs nothing hard about it. In fact these plastic based pencils sharpened better than the wood ones. I already bought black bean,milk and bronze. Love all of them. Don‚Äôt listen to those who say you can‚Äôt sharpen them. I use the crayon, then a power eye shadow and a setting spray and setting powder and they last throughout the day.

reviews.title: Good product but terrible packaging design
reviews.review_text: I like the formula. It‚Äôs creamy and blends well. Lasts okay, definitely wears off throughout the day. However, the packaging design is terrible. It‚Äôs plastic, but you need to sharpen it as if it‚Äôs wood. You need a special size if sharpener for it. Sharpening wastes a bunch of product. It looks like it should just twist up like with similar products from other brands, but no. I like the formula but I won‚Äôt be purchasing any more.

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: I love the color of this product! However, the packaging would not allow me to scroll it up or down. It was not damaged in anyway. So you're only able to use the very very little bit of exposed tip that it comes with. So disappointed to pay this much money for one or two applications.

reviews.title: Creamy pop of colour
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the shade it's called blueberry muffin and it is a super creamy formulae with a gorgeous metallic glow I applied to my cheeks and sheered out , I like that it sheers as it gave a pop of glow and a pretty colour to the cheeks I like that the pencil doesn't need sharpening and it pushes up. This is very versatile it can be used as highlight , blush , eyeshadow and lipstick Very happy with this product

reviews.title: Great Value
reviews.review_text: I underestimated how much you get with one pencil. You can use a pencil sharpener and cut through the plastic. I bough the milk (white) to use all over my face, combining it with the sfx white makeup, to do the mad hatter for Halloween. Now I need to buy more colors for some fun eye makeup.

reviews.title: Cute Pink Color!
reviews.review_text: I love the strawberry milk color, but cannot find it. This is a cute light pink color and Im glad I ordered it. I just discovered that you CAN sharpen these pencils with a jumbo makeup crayon sharpener. Get a good sharpener and it will last way longer!

reviews.title: This is not good.
reviews.review_text: The main issue is that the color on the sight doesn't match when you put it on . It does Not go on dark at all which is why i bought it . It goes on very thin and see-through. It doesn't matter how many times you go over it . And its very oily and after blinking putting it on both eyes, it was smearing onto my upper lid . You could barely see any color at all , it was tiring just trying to put it on . I ended up wiping it off and using something else.

reviews.title: Lid unremovable, product basically disintegrated
reviews.review_text: I ordered this in 4 colours. I was only able to open 2. One I can't open at all--the lid won't come off without snapping the pencil off at the lid. Another one had the same issue, but the pencil basically collapsed in on itself when I tried to remove the lid. I've rarely seen such a poor quality product. The 2 that I was able to open are just okay.

reviews.title: Worst Eye Pencil I've Ever Purchased
reviews.review_text: I have tried this eye pencil as a waterline liner on multiple occasions and it has never worked out as hoped. It bleeds excessively and stings my eyes. It always ends up all over my under-eye and can't even last half an hour without it completely disappearing from my eye. Waste of money, and there is barley any product.

reviews.title: My favorite go to Eye Pencil!
reviews.review_text: I've tried so many eye pencils and every make-up line there is. Yes I am a make-up snob, thinking the most expensive lines must be the best. But I was wrong! NYX makes great products, including their Jumbo Eye pencil. I love the color French Fries, a beautiful deep bronze and it stays on!!! Try it!!!

reviews.title: Very pigmented
reviews.review_text: I bought the pencil in milk white and it was very pigmented and glides smoothly! I would even compare the pigmentation to that of the Makeup Forever flash palette. It is very versatile and can be used in so many ways. A must have for every makeup lover. I love using it in the inner creases of my eyes, it makes my eyes look brighter.

reviews.title: Amazing!!!
reviews.review_text: I recently purchased a jumbo pencil in the color Milk! I'am now in love. It's the most amazing thing ever..it's goes on smoothly and it's easy to smudge to get that blending things going on! As makeup artist your always searching for that perfect white pencil and that Nyx Milk pencil is by the best I've purchased! Thanks and I have so much more shopping trips to look forward with you guys!! -Amanda Glidden

reviews.title: Fresh colour
reviews.review_text: I bought the jumbo pencil in "cottage cheese". I have to admit that I hate the name but the pencil is a nice pearly whites that's a fresh alternative to matte white or nude shades when trying to open the eye. It gives a youthful awake look without looking too frosty or 90's like.

reviews.title: Creamy texture
reviews.review_text: I had never tried shadow sticks before and felt it was time to step it up. Since NYX manufactures a good quality product at a great price, I felt this was a good place to start. Of the 5 colors I purchased my favorites are Slate which I have used as a liner and in the outer corner of my eyelid for a smoky eye, and Strawberry Milk which is my absolute favorite. It is the perfect highlighter for my skin tone. My only complaint is that when I went to retrieve it from my Muji, the shadow portion had somehow separated from the stick. I don't know why or how since I immediately put it in the Muji after using it. I took a tissue and gently pressed it back where it was supposed to be and after a couple of tries it finally seemed to work. Sparkle Nude is lovely as a shadow or highlighter. The color I looked forward to trying the most was Milk. I'm still playing with this one because I haven't gotten the result I was expecting when using it to make my shadows pop. I think I may be using too much or may need to forgo the shadow base I use before Milk to get the result I'm looking for. Milk is a pretty creamy white and I can see multiple uses for it. I also got Bronze which is okay; I actually prefer the Glam Shadow Stick I got in Fard Glamour because the color seems much richer and it really glides over my eyelid. Overall I'm very happy with NYX Jumbo Eye Pencils, and would have rated it excellent had that little problem not happened.

reviews.title: Colors not "accurate"
reviews.review_text: I bought six of the blue (#606) pencils; having had them before I knew the exact color. However, I also ordered a green and lavender pencil which aren't even close to the colors on the chart. I was looking at more of a pastel shade while in actuality they are very dark. I won't return them, considering the price, but I doubt I'll use them. I sure didlike the black lacy bag they were shipped in!!

reviews.title: love it!
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with the jumbo eye pencil in milk!! I heard so much about it prior to buying so I had high expectations safe to say I'm more than pleased with this product. I use it as a primer, an eyeshadow and use it on the inner corners. It is magic! !!

reviews.title: Very pleased with the prdocut
reviews.review_text: After the constant rave about NYX pencil in Milk I decided to buy it. It's pretty good. It's very pigmented, it goes on like butter, and it's blendable. Very nice. I'm considering buying different colors. I just got it today but I don't know how to get the rest of the product yet, like do you sharpen it, twist it? ect.

reviews.title: Not what I expected
reviews.review_text: I got the color MILK about a month ago and I have dark brown skin but I think they may have changed the formula recently, it blends into a white cast too quickly and isn't very buildable at all. I've seen it on YouTube videos and it was buildable and didn't disappear unless blended very heavily. Nice product but doesn't do what the old one did.

reviews.title: Medical use
reviews.review_text: Fun fact that your company probably doesn't even know about, is that your white eye pencils have been used as the standard for marking/ mapping clients for laser! I've used this brand specifically for nearly 10 years to map out and mark clients. Easy to use and safe for all laser :) finally ordered the actually NYX sharpener and so glad I did. Literally the only one on the market that works!

reviews.title: Milk is great for making eyes pop!
reviews.review_text: This product was recommended to me by a friend on FB. She said she used it as an eyelid primer (Milk) and it made her eyeshadows POP! I just had to try since I love bright eye colors. It works great! It just really intensifies the colors! Besides that, using it on your water line is awesome. The formula itself is smooth and doesn't budge!

reviews.title: Amazing product
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I LOVE THIS SO MUCH. I never expected for me to be so obsessed with this product I use this as a white eyeliner to make my eyes pop more as well as an eyeshadow primer to make any eyeshadow 10x more pigmented and longer lasting. I now can't live without this product I have to always have one. And the price is affordable ‚ù§Ô∏è

reviews.title: These pencils work great as shadow bases!
reviews.review_text: I have this in Milk, dark blue and brown and I love to use them over my shadow primer (by another company) when I want to do a high-impact, or richly-colored look (which is basically every day... hehe). The brown and the blue are genius to use under brown or blue powder eyeshadows, as they really help the color come through (even in a smoky look) and they don't interfere too madly with blending. They also both work AMAZINGLY under duo-chrome brown and blue powder shadows -- they really help the two-tone effect pop. Seriously, try the brown under Mac Club. Just do it. As for the Milk, I love this pencil for priming under my eyes when I want to smoke out a look (but not look like a raccoon by 5 pm), and its also a brilliant primer for those days when I'm in a rush and I don't have time to fiddle around with brushes and eyeshadow base drying times and such like that. And if I'm in an even bigger rush, I've also just swiped the brown on my lid and spread it a bit with a concealer brush (and/ or finger) and it passes well as a one-and-done shadow/ liner, too. You can't miss with these (just be sure to use a primer underneath for richest color payoff).

reviews.title: Become sheer when blended
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love these so much! I love something that I can just put on and blend out on my eyes so that it's easy. Unfortunately, the colours are beautiful but once they are blended out even a bit they become almost non-existent. There is a very sheer colour left, but I just wish it was more. And I am so confused why they aren't in twist packaging?

reviews.title: Beautiful Colored Jumbo Pencil
reviews.review_text: I own the NYX jumbo pencils is several different colors. Yes they are a little soft upon application but with a little eye primer the pigment will stay out for hours. Also great underneath NYX loose pigments for a more vibrant color payout. PS the NYX sharpener is a must!

reviews.title: Gold ~ Great Color & Value
reviews.review_text: I have this in "Gold" and really enjoy using it on its own on the lid. I get complements on how green my eyes look when I wear this shadow! Sometimes, I build the color intensely by the lash line and then blend it out with bronze shadow for a pretty effect. The name "gold" is misleading...I would consider it a warm, metallic bronze or more of an antique gold. You can wear it without a primer for 10 hours without it creasing, which is great if you have only a short time to do your makeup in the morning. I would repurchase this color, and I would be interested in buying more colors in the future!

reviews.title: It's an eyeliner
reviews.review_text: Very creamy and goes on nicely. As other reviews have said it doesn't twist up so the amount you see is all there is. Doesn't stay on for very long, as it's very creamy. I got it in black, there were few colours at the drug store, but I definitely want to get it in red. Overall it's just an eyeliner.

reviews.title: 1 of my new favorite eye makeup "go to's"!
reviews.review_text: I bought 4 shades, and now use these chubby pencils, quite often. The texture is so creamy and it glides on, with minimal tugging or pulling of the eye area. That's 1 reason that I normally don't use pencils often. These are highly pigmented, and blendable. Overall, I love these..and will be ordering multiple more shades. Plus a few fave shades, as back ups!

reviews.title: Expected more
reviews.review_text: Pros: creamy color glides on; big pencil Cons: wrong color. I asked for teal. This is tan. Also because it is so creamy after a few hours it sort of wears off into eye creases. TBH I usually use Avon glimmersticks and was looking for an alternative. I'll keep looking

reviews.title: Broke immediately or arrived broken
reviews.review_text: Either the tip was already broken or broke the second it touched my eyelid. Didn't even get to properly use it. Broken and won't work, so right in the trash. Maybe as well have thrown out money into the trash and at least not hoped for anything better! Super disappointed in this product. Expected better -- or at least expected it to not be broken immediately.

reviews.title: Blends into Skin/Applies Thin/Almost Clear
reviews.review_text: I bought the Pure Gold colour a couple months ago and have only used it twice. The warm gold colour looks great when testing it on your hand, but unfortunately it didn't apply well to my eyelids and ends up looking almost clear. This product could complement an eyeshadow for providing some subtle sparkles, but it's not really an eyeliner pencil. Too difficult to get a solid, colour-blocked line. Might be fine for others' makeup styles though!

reviews.title: Effortless, Beautiful Drama
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôve been using the Nyx Jumbo Eye Pencil for approximately 2 years and I absolutely love it. I always receive compliments when wearing it. In fact, I was at a major retail store that sells high-end makeup, and two sales ladies came up to me and asked what pencil I was wearing because they loved the way it made my eyes ‚Äúpop out‚Äù. I was more than happy to tell them it was a Nyx product.

reviews.title: "Smudge" eye liner pencil
reviews.review_text: I ordered a black eye liner. At first apply, I liked the thick line. But after a couple of hours, and in following uses, I noticed smudge marks under my eyes. I didn't apply eye liner below my eyes. I believe this liner is too oily and the quality is "cheap"!! This has happened on more than one application. I wouldn't recommend. Pay more for quality!!

reviews.title: Miracle Worker!
reviews.review_text: I bought this a month ago as a recommendation from my friend & I love it! I use the color milk under my eyeshadow & it makes the colors just pop! I use it every time I apply my eyeshadow & I can't get the same look without it. The only thing is I wish it came with more, like if you could turn the bottom & push more up like a lip balm or something because it goes really fast & it seems a waste to have that entire tube with only the little bit at the top. But overall, great product, a definite buy!

reviews.title: So amazing
reviews.review_text: I use it as a shadow primer and waterline pencil & lemme tell you... This stuff is so good. Doesn't crease, highly pigmented, creamy, blendable & long lasting. Also good for reeeaaalllyy pale people for highlight while you're contouring. Highly reccomend.

reviews.title: My Favorite!
reviews.review_text: I love this jumbo Milk pencil. I bought it to use as a little brow highlight but I ended up using it only as a "primer" so to speak under my eye shadows that need an extra pop of color. When you need a paticular color to POP just add this jumbo milk first and then apply your shadow and WOW what a difference.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I used this a view times (I have the shade milk) and I wanted it as an eyeshadow base because I saw a lot of beauty vloggers use it as that, but it didn't do anything as a base. Then I tried it to line my water line to make my eyes look bigger and it works great for that. It's super creamy on the waterline (but kinda tugs on the eyelid when using it as a base). It was super pigmented and lasted well.

reviews.title: Loved for Years!
reviews.review_text: Found NYX Jumbo Eye Pencil at ULTA several years ago (I think!) and always wanted to replace. After finally looking online I could replenish supply, buy sharpener (sorely needed) and gift others with it. For me the cocoa brown family of colors are what I purchase and love!

reviews.title: Nice Product, Odd Sharpening
reviews.review_text: I had been looking for a product like this and was excited to purchase these pencil eyeshadows. The colors are great and they‚Äôre fun to use but I assumed they twisted up. I don‚Äôt have a sharpener as other reviewers have mentioned so I probably won‚Äôt buy this product again.

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: I ordered Cottage Cheese, and was really excited for this product. But the color payoff is so poor, and doesn't go on evenly. I wanted to use it to brighten the inner corner of my eyes, but its problems make that difficult. This is 2 stars because it's an ok eyeshadow primer.

reviews.title: Love
reviews.review_text: Don't need to push hard and it's very pigmented.
I thought jumbo might be difficult to use but I love these. I bought several shades

reviews.title: I would like a full refund.
reviews.review_text: I did not receive this item. I would like a refund
To thick doesn't keep a point. Love the brand though.

reviews.title: Smooth
reviews.review_text: Goes on very smooth and the exact color I wanted for a while, very satisfying purchase

reviews.title: Arrived with the top shattered and the tip broken
reviews.review_text: Top cover shattered and tip broken off. The color is FABULOUS though!
still as smudgy as the other i use. its good when ya can't get grip on smaller objects

reviews.title: Great Makeup
reviews.review_text: Love these eyeshadows they're really well made.

reviews.title: Great to cover dark shadows
reviews.review_text: It works well to hide my dark shadows under my eyes
The eyeshadow stick will not roll up from the bottom as it should.
I didn't get this product. They substituted it for something else
Didnt work on eyelids like I thought it would. Dont use it.

reviews.title: Not dark enough
reviews.review_text: It said brown but it wasnt that brown

reviews.title: Not long lasting
reviews.review_text: Pretty color. But wipes off so easily so it doesn't last long.

reviews.title: Great multi use stick.
reviews.review_text: Love this. I use it all the time on my eyes over my eye makeup.
Such a wonderful product. Smooth, sleek, and awesome. I would definitely purchase it again.
my daughter loves this brand and color, shes happy I'm happy lol!

reviews.title: Shame. I like the product, just waste of space
reviews.review_text: I thought it was just me but I see other complaints about inability to twist for more product. Exactly how much product is in the tube we can't see. I plan to cut it in half to find out once I can't use anymore.

reviews.title: GOOD OL JUMBO EYE PENCIL
reviews.review_text: The pink one is a super fun color and applies just fine! Very pretty and does its job!

reviews.title: Reccomend
reviews.review_text: Looks great and easy to blend, I wear this on my inner corners

reviews.title: Good product
reviews.review_text: Love the colors, looks great and easy to use, fun, vibrant colors

reviews.title: Eye shadow pencil
reviews.review_text: I just love the color lite pink. Goes on great but not heavy. Would definitely buy again

reviews.title: Eye Shadows
reviews.review_text: I LOVE NYX Jumbo eye pencil shadows so was very happy to receive the ones I had ordered.

reviews.title: Love It
reviews.review_text: Used this as a eyeshadow base and now I can't stop using it as a eyeshadow base. Take all my moneyy

reviews.title: Pure White
reviews.review_text: I love this to put on my eyelids for a primer..this is my third one I have bought!! Love it..

reviews.title: Love these Pencils
reviews.review_text: Love the colors. Glides on smoothly. Fabulous price.

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this jumbo pencil. I use it for an eye shadow base. My eye shadow looks amazing!

reviews.title: Yes!!
reviews.review_text: Love love love it!! It glides on so well and the color is amazing I want all the colors

reviews.title: Purchased "Yogurt"
reviews.review_text: Lovely color, great base. It creases on my eyes even with a primer.

reviews.title: Great eyeliner, horrible design
reviews.review_text: I love this pencil. It is super soft, glides on beautifully, i have the dark blue and it's a beautiful color of blue that accentuates my skin tone and eyes, but I don't see how you can sharpen it. I have a variety of sharpeners and it doesn't fit in any, and it's in a plastic casing. It would have to be really unique sharpener to work. Is it going to shave off part of the plastic? Or is it just sharpening the tip? Because there's really not much colored pencil underneath there. If you have used it quite a few times and you just want to sharpen the tip, you can't push it up far enough to get it high enough to sharpen the tip. Love the product, but cannot recommend due to the sharpening issue. Maybe you should post a video how to sharpen!?

reviews.title: But can you sharpen it?
reviews.review_text: I came here to read the reviews, thinking that I was missing something. I thought, surely there's not just a half inch of product sitting on top of a huge plastic tube, right? But, nope. It really is just a bit of product on top of a big hollow plastic tube. It just amused me that every review that mentions this fact is responded to by telling them that they can sharpen it. "Sure, it's wasteful and deceptive but did you know that you can sharpen it? because you can totally sharpen it!" Oh well. I still love Nyx and will continue to use their products.

reviews.title: Terrible deign
reviews.review_text: There is no reason this product needs to be "sharpened." It should have a twist up design. Ridiculous!

reviews.title: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The only thing Is if you have oily skin you can't use these because it will bunch up and you have to wear powder over it to set it

reviews.title: Works Great
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I bought this jumbo pencil for a background on my eyes, so the other colors pop! It works great!

reviews.title: eye makeup really soft!?
reviews.review_text: Is the eye makeup in the pencil suppose to be soft? I mean really soft? It stays on good but I feel like it'll be used up really quick from being soo soft!!! We'll see!

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.review_text: I love the Nyx Jumbo stick so much :) It is very easy to use and perfect to create quick &nice make up.Love that it is multi use ,so you can use it as anything you want ;)

reviews.title: In love
reviews.review_text: Several months ago someone recommended the NYX Jumbo Eye Pencil to me. I am now addicted to it and have recommended it to many others! It's fat and goes on silky smooth with good coverage. Love this product!

reviews.title: White eye pencil
reviews.review_text: Love this jumbo eye pencil! It is easy to hold and use. I use this white to accent around my eyes. The color is perfect and stays all day. It glides on smoothly.
I bought 3 of these to put in my makeup kit I just recently purchased. I don't dovto well with the liquid eyeliner, that was already in the kit. These are much better. Thank you.

reviews.title: Website shows wrong color associated with color!!
reviews.review_text: The name "Frappe" was located below a beautiful blue eyeshadow stick. This was WRONG!! FRAPEE IS BROWN. THIS IS A WM WEBSITE ISSUE, NOT A PRODUCT QUALITY ISSUE, STILL, VERY DISAPPOINTED!!

reviews.title: Can't say it's great
reviews.review_text: It is difficult to make the tip come up, it's messier than any other eyeliner I've ever used. The color isn't bad if you can line without it getting all over your eyelids. Wouldn't recommend.

reviews.title: My new favorite eyeshadow
reviews.review_text: I love this eyeshadow. Very affordable price for sure but the most important part is that goes on smoothly and stays on all day and yet its easy to remove. I currently have 3 different shades. Ill be buying more

reviews.title: jumbo stick
reviews.review_text: I recently bought this jumbo stick. And let me tell you its AMAZING! perfect for a pop of color and makes eyeshadow intense. I truly recommend this:) Araceli!

reviews.title: Rubs off easily.
reviews.review_text: Rubs off easily. Not sure if it would stay on all day. And I don't know how to get this to come out more. It's plastic so you can sharpen it and there's no way to turn it to get more out of it. Will return

reviews.title: Jumbo eye pencil does not jumbo look
reviews.review_text: Very waxy feel; needs more pigment. Does not last if you have semi- oily to oily lids. I use as a base then use my powder shadow over. Will not buy again.

reviews.title: Beautiful colours!
reviews.review_text: I got the Flan and I think it's perfect for my olive skin tone. So easy to apply it as it's in such a convenient form. I'm really happy with NYX PMU coming out with this! 5 stars!

reviews.title: Jumbo Stick in the Shade Milk

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.review_text: Perfect shadow pencils! I put on my lids, use a brush to blend and I‚Äôm good to go! I‚Äôve bought in many colors. Only downside is they have to be sharpened.

reviews.title: Liquid and pencil liners

reviews.title: Good Product
reviews.review_text: This pencil is pretty good. I'm not sure I bought the right product for my need ...minimizing shadows in some lines around my mouth, but as an eyeshadow/liner it's good, just a bit big for lining.

reviews.title: stunning colours
reviews.review_text: These pencils, despite their stunning colours, are not long-lasting and are not suitable for use on droopy eyelids. I bought it because of its long-lastingness, but I was wrong.

reviews.title: Sexy eyeliner - will definitely make your eyes pop
reviews.review_text: Amazing eyeliner! I put this one for the first time a few nights ago after purchasing it and I was so surprised at how amazing it made my eyes look. I did not stop turning heads after using this eyeliner. I will definitely buy this again.

reviews.title: No staying power
reviews.review_text: Used this for the first time today on a cleansed face. Colour is great BUT it has creased within a few hours. Very disappointed as not a cheap item.

reviews.title: Eh
reviews.review_text: Does the job, but it gets flaky when I blend it out. I wanted to use it as a shadow base, but I can't because of the flaking. Also not as pigmented as I expected.

reviews.title: shiny and easy to use
reviews.review_text: I loved using the Jumbo pencil, first of all, it is versatile, depending on the colour it can be used it as a blush, eyeshadow or a highlighter. I love how it glides on my face and applies smoothly

reviews.title: Enhance your eye area beautifully.
reviews.review_text: It does its job to give more highlight in my eye area. I do have a dark dark brown eyes which is almost black and it totally enhance the shape of my eyes.

reviews.title: Milk is perfect!
reviews.review_text: Milk is THE perfect base for making colors pop. I can use Milk and then pretty much any color I want no matter the quality and the color will look great! And this stays on too. Blending is easy and it glides on!

reviews.title: Love as a base
reviews.review_text: I've been watching Sir John use pencils all over eyelids, then applying those satin eyeshadows on top. These pencils are real creamy and the eyeshadows can really be shown off. So happy with purchase.

reviews.title: Great eye pencil
reviews.review_text: I bought the jumbo eye pencils a month ago and use it every day . it goes on so smooth and the Colors are fantastic . also once on it stays all day !/

reviews.title: Nyx Jumbo Eye Pencil
reviews.review_text: I purchased it a month ago and am so happy with what it does, the results are incredible and I think compared to elf, this one stands out in many ways

reviews.title: I love this product
reviews.review_text: I brought this product about a mouth ago. It made me eyes pop and all my friends ask me what do I use. And where did I buy it from. I do tutorials on my utube. Great product everything I buy for this line.

reviews.title: Great product
reviews.review_text: This is a great product. Stays on long and goes on smooth. Loved the color too (Plush Red). Only thing I would say is there is not a lot of lipstick in one stick. After you get through the point its gone!

reviews.title: Love the lavender!
reviews.review_text: I had been using the lavender jumbo pencil for years and loved it and was so upset when I couldn't find it anymore. Was so happy to find them on your site!!!

reviews.title: love the jumbo size
reviews.review_text: I've been using these jumbo eyeliners for years and love them. Love the creamy consistency and how easy it is to blend. I like the fact that you can smudge the liner into a faint hue or keep it strong.

reviews.title: Fantastic!!!
reviews.review_text: Totally love this Jumbo Eye Pencil. So smooth and long lasting! Just a tip: you need to buy the sharpener that is made specially for the pencil so you can sharpen without issues.

reviews.title: Great For An Everyday Easy Makeup
reviews.review_text: Great to do a fast look but the colors behave differently, they are not all efficient. I like them but they don't stay put the whole day, they just fade, except for one which is more opaque.

reviews.title: A great discovery
reviews.review_text: This can be used as a base for powder shadow or on its own. I can see myself using this a lot during the summer months on minimal makeup days. The color payoff and staying power are excellent. I think I'm going to buy a few more colors

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This jumbo eye pencil is absolutely amazing it is a new staple in my makeup routeen it makes the perfect eye primer.

reviews.title: Love ‚ù§Ô∏è

reviews.title: No staying power
reviews.review_text: I received the jumbo eye pencil in the color cupcake, and it didn't have staying power for me even with two kind of eye primers that I tried. I returned product. I did like the color though.

reviews.title: Amazing Results!
reviews.review_text: I bought the jumbo eye pencil in milk for my inner corner and waterline. It makes you look awake and I'm incredibly pleased with the results because it stays on for hours.

reviews.title: Smooth as a base
reviews.review_text: I use Milk as a base, over primer and under shadows. I recently found some really old baked shadows with extremely poor pigmentation. BUT the colors showed up beautifully when layered over Milk!

reviews.title: jumbo eye pencil
reviews.review_text: I love the colors. I find them hard to use because I can't make a thin line with them so I use a eye liner brush and just cover it with the pencil color. It works great.

reviews.title: Amazing white
reviews.review_text: Bought this 2 weeks ago and loveeee hiw it glides in and the pigment. Have tried many others .. this is a great one. its grrat to open uo the eyes and when mixed with eyesshades .. eyes look fab !!!

reviews.title: Great for under your eye shadow or on their own!

reviews.title: Great Pencil!

reviews.title: Super smooth and blendable
reviews.review_text: I got this pencil in white and I love it. I use it mostly on the inside corner of my eye and it's very blendable and not cakey or fake looking at all, which is a problem I've had in the past.

reviews.title: Awesome pigment
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I just started using other items from nyx aside from the liquid matte lipsticks, and I must say the the the milk jumbo eye pencil is a great eyeshadow primer.

reviews.title: Jumbo pencil perfection
reviews.review_text: I just love the jumbo pencil there is so many different ways to use them. There creamy and very pigmented a must have in your collection. I'm ready to get one in every color.

reviews.title: I would definitely recommend these
reviews.review_text: I love these so much! I want one in every color. They formula is creamy and goes on the skin so seamlessly. I love how multipurpose they are too; I use them for my eye liner, eye shadow, blush, and highlight.

reviews.title: eye primer
reviews.review_text: I use this to prime my eyes for shadow. It woks great. I gave one stick to my entire family and I have convrted them from expensive primer to the eye pencil in milk. I also use cashmere for my inner eye hghlight

reviews.title: I totally recommend this product
reviews.review_text: I rate this 1000/10 it‚Äôs so creamy and glides in so beautifully I‚Äôm going to use it for my under eye and it‚Äôs amazing I totally recommend this product a lot I got the milk shade

reviews.title: Works just fine
reviews.review_text: It's a decent eye pencil. I find that it doesn't really show up when used on my waterline which is where I really wanted to use it which is unfortunate, but I've also used it in the inner corners of my eyes and it looks pretty good.

reviews.review_text: I love the colors & consistency but there is no way to ‚Äúroll‚Äù up the crayon. I found that there is plenty of crayon in the tube when I pulled off the bottom & used an eye pencil to push up the crayon. Fix this & it would be perfect.

reviews.title: Great product!

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.review_text: Oh I love all the colors. Applies smoothly, light weight, my eyes pop in color. The best part is you can sharpen them! Just like a pencil, so easy and smooth. Excellent products! Thanks NYX

reviews.title: Great color and price

reviews.title: Deceptive Packaging

reviews.review_text: Creamy but it smears on my eyelids when used as eyeliner ordered it in milk color twice it dried out faster than other eyeliner/ shadow sticks I've used

reviews.review_text: I use this to prime my eyelids for eyeshadow, and I also use it on my waterline. It's super opaque, and super bright! My only complaint is that there's a really small amount, wish there was more!

reviews.title: the pigment is there!

reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] These are really good. I love the color Milk. It gives my eyes a good pop of color and brightens and open my eyes on tired days.

reviews.title: Eggplant shade
reviews.review_text: The colour and shimmer are nice, really creamy too. Very easy to apply and good cover. But after a short while it smudges and doesn't preserve it's initial form. Also, the end cap came off, while keeping the lid on when using it, so not the best structure.

reviews.title: Tiny amount in a large case.
reviews.review_text: Such a small amount. I am sad about this, because I really like the product. Complete waste of packaging.

reviews.title: Great Product
reviews.review_text: 5‚≠êÔ∏è quality, I am currently using the white color. I have not tried to sharpen yet, glad to know that it does sharpen. I would prefer a twist design.

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.review_text: Best eyeliner, nice and smudgy. I have extremely sensitive skin and eyes and I can wear this, even in my waterline!! Love it!

reviews.title: Small amount
reviews.review_text: Love the product but it doesn't last very long. I was expecting it to twist and push out more product but once the visible product is gone, it's gone. Kind of pricy for such a small amount of product.

reviews.title: Bleeds
